import Image from 'next/image' import Link from 'next/link' import { Suspense } from 'react' import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button" import { Input } from "@/components/ui/input" import { ShoppingCart, Search, Menu } from "lucide-react" import ApiService from '@/lib/ApiService' async function getFeaturedProducts() { const response = await ApiService.fetchProducts() if (response.status < 200 || response.status >= 300) { throw new Error('Failed to fetch products') } const data = response.data?.content || [] const sortedProducts = data .filter((product) => product.judge !== 'NULL') .sort((a, b) => b.judge - a.judge) .slice(0, 3) return sortedProducts.length === 0 ? data.slice(0, 3) : sortedProducts } function ProductCard({ product }) { return (

) : ( {product.oprice.toLocaleString()} 원 )}
) } export default function Home() { return (
